definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: All four subjects go back to the tradition of Pythagoras .
sentences.chinese: 所有四門科目可追溯到畢達哥拉斯時代的傳統。

sentences.english: One of Pythagoras ' beliefs was that the essence of being is number.
sentences.chinese: 畢達哥拉斯一個信念是“存在的本質是數”。

sentences.english: Pythagoras is my friend in these days.
sentences.chinese: 畢達哥拉斯是我的朋友在這些日子。
在畢達哥拉斯定理中還有更復雜的例子。

sentences.english: He is best known for the Pythagorean theorem, which bears his name.
sentences.chinese: 他因以自己名字命名的畢達哥拉斯定理而最爲知名。

sentences.english: It is considered to be part of the widespread legends of Pythagoras of this time.
sentences.chinese: 這被認爲是部分普遍傳說畢達哥拉斯的這個時候。

sentences.english: Of or relating to Pythagoras or his geometry.
sentences.chinese: 屬於或關於畢達哥拉斯或他的幾何學的。

sentences.english: The Greek scientist, Pythagoras , used it as a remedy for scorpion stings.
sentences.chinese: 希臘科學家畢達哥拉斯把芥菜當作治療蠍子螫傷的藥。

sentences.english: Zhuang-zi the time which locates with Pythagoras is similar.
sentences.chinese: 莊子同畢達哥拉斯所處的時代差不多。
